name: Terminal Control: Lite
description:
In this game, you play as an approach (TRACON) controller handling arrivals and departures in the airspace.

You gain points for every arrival that lands safely on the runway, and for every departure handed off to the area control centre. But beware, every time a plane gets too close to other planes or to terrain, your score is halved! What high score will you be able to get?

Features:
-Real life airports, runways & approaches
-Real life SID & STAR procedures, updated every new AIRAC cycle
-Live weather
-Game saves
-Tutorial for beginners

(Note: This is a very early version of the game; more features will be added in subsequent updates)
